_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
December 6th Operations Update: Hello Crystal Skiers and Riders, the mountain will continue to remain closed through Wednesday 12/10 due to low snow depths. Check back for further updates towards Wednesday. While there's no shortage of precipitation in the forecast with this upcoming atmospheric river event, unfortunately, the outlook on freezing levels will continue to push out our opening day. We remain ready to spin at a moment's notice, as soon as conditions allow. Until then, thank you, and keep thinking snow!
  • Day tickets and rentals purchased in advance can be deferred to a different day with applicable price adjustments by emailing gservice@skicrystal.com or giving us a call daily from 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. at 833-279-7895, or will otherwise be automatically refunded by 2pm before the day of your booking. 
  • Kids Ski Free offers on lift access and rentals have been extended through the 14th. These offers can be rebooked for any time through the 14th (operations-dependent) or later, with applicable price adjustments, or cancelled.
  • For Ski and Ride School bookings, keep an eye out for further communications through email. 
Parking reservations will for days we are closed will be automatically canceled with no penalties, and any payments will be refunded.

ADVANCED PARKING RESERVATIONS FOR THE SEASON ARE OPEN. BOOK YOURS HERE.
Shuttle Reservations on are open for 7 day window bookings. Reminder-  reservation cancellations are now required this year.

Season to date snowfall + Base Depths reported as of  12/6.
 
REX 2.0: Rainier Express is moving along nicely for the slated spin of December 2025. Stay tuned with our social media and blog for imagery and updates!
Crystal Mountain Instagram | Crystal Mountain Facebook | Crystal Mountain Blog

PRE-SEASON UPHILL TRAVEL INFO: Do not travel near or under the Rainier Express lift line as both hazards overhead and in the snow may exist as construction continues. Uphill travel may be restricted at any time before and during the season for avalanche mitigation or other safety concerns. Uphill travelers must confirm that the "No Uphill Travel lights" are off. These are located at: The bottom station of the Gondola, Bottom lift shack of Discovery lift the bottom lift shack of Chinook Express lift and the top of Quicksilver.
  • Slopes are not avalanche-controlled. Ski and ride at your own risk.
  • Be aware of heavy equipment across the mountain. Be sure you are visible and give ample space to moving vehicles.
  • In case of incident, Ski Patrol may not be available to help. Rescue, if possible, will be delayed and may cost you. Come prepared and self-sufficient.
 An Uphill Travel pass is required during the regular season and can be obtained at no cost at Guest Services. For complete information see our Uphill Travel Page.  


HIRING FOR THE 25/26 SEASON

Did you know we're hiring for the 25/26 season? Come work and play at Washingtons premier ski destination! Rooted in community, the Crystal Crew is unbeatable. Check out our positions on our website today.

25/26 WINTER PRODUCTS & PASSES

  • NIGHT SKIING HAS BEEN EXTENDED FOR THE 25/26 SEASON! FROM 28 to 53 NIGHTS! Read full announcement 
  • Daily lift tickets are now on sale, plus $62 Tuesday's are NOW DOUBLED! Every 2nd and now 4th Tuesday of the 25/26 season, ride for only $62! Lock in your holiday plans, or your next trip with savings you can't beat. Purchase now and save later.
  • IKON Pass: Base and unlimited on sale for the 25/26 season!
  • Performance Ski, Snowboard and Beginner Rental Pass: ON SALE NOW! 
  • Tune Pass: Premier and Base available for purchase!
  • Demo Pass: Lock in the best gear of the 25/26 season with unlimited use!
  • 25/26 3-Day Midweek & Anytime Passes: Your pass to the perfect powder day, groomer day or when conditions are right for you. Purchase today and gear up for a rad winter.
  • Afternoon Pass: With extended night skiing dates, take your Afternoon Pass to the next level!

25/26 WINTER PROGRAMS,CLINICS, AND NECESSITIES

  • Ski and Ride School: Explore our programs and find your right fit.
  • Freeride Program (NEW! Adult Programs now available): Registration now open, limited spots available! 
  • AIARE Course & Certification: Ski the backcountry with expert knowledge and certification
  • Seasonal Gear storage: Hassle-free on mountain storage with limited availability, lock your space in today!
  • Seasonal Lockers: For you or the entire family, check out options today .
  • A-Lot Permits:  Lock in your A-Lot permit today, limited availability.
    Full Day Seasonal Lesson Programs for 4-6 year olds are now available- with lunch included too!   
  • Secure your spot. Already signed up for a 2-hour session and want to upgrade? No problemjust call us at 833-279-7895

In case of on-mountain emergency: Call 360-663-3064 or 911
